item.title: New module: system/s5cmd version 2.0.0
item.description: Parallel S3 and local filesystem execution tool.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: system/midnight-commander version 4.8.29
item.description: GNU Midnight Commander is a visual file manager.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/ga version 5.8.2
item.description: Global Arrays (GA) is a Partitioned Global Address Space (PGAS) programming model.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/nodejs version 18.15.0
item.description: Node.js is a JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine. It provides the npm package manager.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: biology/cellranger version 7.1.0
item.description: Cell Ranger is a set of analysis pipelines that process Chromium single-cell RNA-seq output to align reads, generate gene-cell matrices and perform clustering and gene expression analysis.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: math/slepc version 3.18.2
item.description: SLEPc is a Scalable Library for Eigenvalue Problem Computations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New module: devel/py-petsc4py version 3.18.5_py39
item.description: Python bindings for PETSc, the Portable, Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: devel/petsc version 3.18.5
item.description: PETSc, the Portable, Extensible Toolkit for Scientific Computation, is a suite of data structures and routines for the scalable (parallel) solution of scientific applications modeled by partial differential equations.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)

item.title: New version: math/arpack version 3.9.0
item.description: Collection of Fortran77 subroutines designed to solve large scale eigenvalue problems.
item.author: kilian@stanford.edu (Kilian Cavalotti)
